name: Vulcan's Fury
description:
Our submission for Mini Jam 101, where the theme was Limit, and the limitation was control the environment!

Finding yourself in the underworld, you stumble into Vulcan, the Roman God of Fires domain! After stealing his blacksmith hammer, you've obtained the power of manipulating lava to your desire, parting the liquid for your escape!

Controls

WASD: Movement
Mouse: Camera Control
Jump / Double Jump: Spacebar
Shift: Dash
Left Mouse Click: Lower Lava
Right Mouse Click: Raise Lava

Hint: Jump + Dash + jump will grant you lots of distance!

Credit

All programming and models done by myself and @HLeitch
Modified textures aquired from Quixel
Music from Zapsplat
